member.name: M:KratosDesign.Shape.RoundedRectangle(System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Single,KratosDesign.Shape.Corner)
member.summary: Rounds the corners of a rectangle and returns the graphics path.
member.param: A rectangle whose corners should be rounded.
The radius of the rounded corners. This value should be bigger than or equal to 0 and less or equal to the half of the smallest value of the rectangle’s side.
A value that specifies the corners that should be excluded from rounding. This value can be one or combination of the Shape.Corner enumeration value combined by "OR".
